pageContent: Okay, so because every time that I basically would take a break or stop doing repair, I would start everyone off with a deal just to get, I want to say five to ten brand new customers get their results in, lets say in two months or so and use those results to its basically free promo. So I did ten customers, and those ten customers are from the first ten people that may have responded to my ads. And then those people are posting the results, or Im posting the results and sharing them. And thats how I would get more customers. And then I also would raise the price. So if I say Im going to run a sale and my sale is $347, I dont know what it is about the psychology of the number, like the 47 or the 99 that always seems to draw people in when you have those price type of ranges. So I could do 199, I could do 299. But something about that three, 4729-919-9399, those are the prices that I typically try to stay in the range of. So the lowest I would offer is I offered one time, like $147 to start and then the monthly fee. So lets say Im going to do a rapid rescore and Im going to help the customer. I would do a smaller fee of 347 or even the four to $500 price range because its not something thats crazy thats going to hurt them, but its also not something that will take from their closing cost, it wont take from their home price. The appraisal could be usually around $500 as well. So we want something thats affordable. So its not necessarily luxury service. Its affordable to help you get on track to where you want to go.
